      • requestFlatPeerConfig

        public static java.util.Map requestFlatPeerConfig(java.lang.String address,
                                                  java.lang.String tenant,
                                                  java.lang.String category,
                                                  java.lang.String label)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Fetches a Peer configuration matching the tenant identifier, service category, and service label.
        Parameters:
        address - the catalog endpoint url
        tenant - the tenant identifier
        category - the service category name
        label - the service label name
        Returns:
        Peer configuration Map
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the host of the address url cannot be resolved
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if timeout occurs during connection or socket read/write operations
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

        public static java.util.Set requestFlatConfigsInTransactorGroup(java.lang.String address,
                                                                java.lang.String transactorGroup)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Fetches the configurations for databases assigned to the specified transactor(s).
        Parameters:
        address - the catalog endpoint url
        transactorGroup - the transactor name, or a common-separated string of multiple transactor-names
        Returns:
        Set containing database configurations
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the host of the address url cannot be resolved
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if timeout occurs during connection or socket read/write operations
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
